task_instructions:
You are working on a codebase. Your task is to make the necessary code changes to accomplish the following:

Add prefilters only once in the compound and text similarity retrievers

This change ensures that the pre filters are propagated in the downstream retrievers only once. It also removes the ability to extends `explainQuery` in the compound retriever. This is not needed as the rank docs are now responsible for the explanation.

Please make all necessary code changes to complete this task.
synthesized_task_instructions: Add prefilters only once in the compound and text similarity retrievers, and remove the ability to extend explainQuery in the compound retriever since rank docs now handle explanation.
